title: Carson Lighted MagniGrip 4.5x LED Lighted Magnifier with Precision Tweezers (MG-88)
description: The MG-88 MagniGrip from Carson Optical is a compact 4.5x Magnifier with attached fine-point tweezers and bright LED light. This Magnifier/tweezers combo is perfect for all those "little" jobs... when you need an extra hand! It is extremely lightweight and can be used as an aid for everything from hobbies and crafts to getting out that pesky splinter. At Carson, we strive to make sure our customers are 100% satisfied with the quality of our magnifiers.   Carson will repair or replace your magnifier if it is found to have manufacturing defects in materials or workmanship..
